item.title: Boulevard of Broken Dreams - Green Day
item.author: Harish V
item.description:
Boulevard of Broken Dreams by Green Day - Guitar Chords

Here is the basic chord strumming for the song. Sing and strum along!

Remember to use a capo on the 1st fret of the guitar

Chords Required (in sequence): E(minor), G(major), D(major), A(minor)

Strumming Pattern: D D U (change chord now) D D U (change) ...

Repeat the above for the entire song.

Itâ€™s that simple! :D

Refer to video if unsure: Link to YouTube
